ygData.subject: RE: Cazic Thule (was: EQ Party!!!)
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh yeah is right, they already did this.  24 of us took him on last night (we knew he was fixed but had to try), we were all level 45 to 50, and he pretty much
ygData.messageBody:
Oh yeah is right, they already did this. 24 of us took him on last night
(we knew he was fixed but had to try), we were all level 45 to 50, and he
pretty much laughed and laid waste to us all. we maybe got 10 to 15% dmg on
him. he now hits for double 235's (i think 185 was the max before) and his
FAVORITE thing is to knock you back a few hundred feet for some dmg (like a
horizontal gravity flux) then summon you to his feet to bash you some more.
i think we will stick to everything else in the zone, all the normal stuff,
dracoliche is still easy enough, everything guarding Cazic is doable, and
leave Cazic alone shouting to the zone to beware, cause now you better cause
its true.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 50 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
Erisi, Level 15 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr


> -----Original Message-----

> Oh yeah, he said Cazic (the God in the Fear Plane?) is gonna
> be "fixed" real
> soon now. So, you high levs better git your killin in while
> the killin is
> good - sounds like they are gonna un-nerf him.
> >
